ItemTooltips.dust: If there is enemy stelth units don't forget to have one with you at all time. Until late game when u buy gem.
ItemTooltips.ward_observer: Allways have wards with you at all time as support and remember when old one is about to expire go and replace it with new one before it does!
ItemTooltips.ward_sentry: Use it for early game to de-ward your jungle camp's and deward enemy wards to take away enemy team vision.
ItemTooltips.courier: Buy Curier when game starts or if some other suport did it buy flying currier.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Get Mekansm fast the sooner the better. It will also help push faster.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_basilius: Toggle it off until level 6 or when your team decide to push lane. It allso gives your golems +2 armor.
ItemTooltips.pipe: Use it right before battle is about to start to migrate initial enemy spell damage openers.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: The disable it offers is handy in almost all situations, making chasing, escaping or even initiating a teamfight much easier.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: You can use it to escape, chase or even to save teammates. Overall, it gives great mobility.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter:
Go for it when u finish mekansm or pipe depends what other support in your team is going for.
It's superb item for warlock even as support don't think about it just go for it when u can the sooner the better it will help your team a lot!.
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard: Makes you harder to kill and gives a lot of mana. Its ability is perfect for teamfights.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: Try to use it when few people needs mana from your team for maximum effectivness.
ItemTooltips.smoke_of_deceit: Gather with all your allies and smoke up to gank enemy heroes. Remember geting at 1000 range of enemy or tower stelth will be broken.

AbilityTooltips.warlock_fatal_bonds: Use it right before big fights if possible or right after u cast your ultimate.
AbilityTooltips.warlock_shadow_word:
Heal your allies when they run out of potions or being focused on.
It also can be used to secure early first blood when cordinated with alies.
AbilityTooltips.warlock_upheaval: Use it after your ultimate to give your golems time to destroy enemies because they move slow or to slow down enemy pushing at towers.
AbilityTooltips.warlock_rain_of_chaos: Try to use it at 3 or more enemy heroes for maximum effect!
